overview.description: Appreciating the outdoors, this segment wants to actively engage with nature. Whether it's finding a new hiking trail or looking for the perfect spot to catch the sunset, they seek to explore the world around them.

topics.copy: Hiking and exploring are very common topics within this behavior. Interactions with wildlife and natural features like rivers are common as well.

age.copy: The people that live in areas known for outdoor activity are likely to be above average in age.

income.copy: Areas with high levels of this segment tend to be much wealthier than average.

education.copy: Residents of high scoring neighborhoods tend to be well-educated.

employment.copy: High scoring areas tend to have below average unemployment. Residents of these areas frequently work in agriculture or for utilities companies.

ethnicity.copy: High scoring areas do not tend to be diverse. This behavior is often found near White communities and is one of the only segments to be associated with Native American communities.

urbanicity.copy: Outdoor adventures are much more likely to be found in rural areas.

home_ownership.copy: Residents in high scoring areas are likely to own their homes at higher rates than the national average.

political_affiliation.copy: Areas with high levels of outdoor activities provided conservative support in the 2016 election.

other_insights: This behavior is associated with areas where there are more male than female residents.

time.copy: Outdoor activities are more frequently shared on the weekends and in warmer months.

pois.copy: Businesses that provide outdoor experiences and laid back restaurants are common in high scoring neighborhoods.

overview.description: Improving flexibility, strength, and overall well-being is the yogi's aim. This segment is looking for the right community, instruction, and accessories.

topics.copy: Specific types of yoga poses are very common topics for this segment. Yoga equipment and encouragement to others to try yoga are also commonly observed.

age.copy: This behavior is prevalent in areas with a median age close to the typical U.S. neighborhood.

income.copy: Yoga related activity is highest in wealthier neighborhoods.

education.copy: Residents of high scoring neighborhoods are very well educated, with bachelor degrees held at a much higher rate than usual.

employment.copy: These neighborhoods tend to have below average unemployment. Commonly found where residents work in corporate management or professional services.

ethnicity.copy: This behavior occurs frequently in diverse neighborhoods, notably near Asian and White communities.

urbanicity.copy: Yoga activity is more common in urban neighborhoods.

home_ownership.copy: Home ownership is near the typical rate in high scoring areas.

political_affiliation.copy: Residents of high scoring areas demonstrated a preference for liberal candidates in the 2016 election.

other_insights: Residents of high scoring areas are less likely to identify as religious.

time.copy: Yoga activity is commonly observed in the beginning of the week and gradually trails off till Sunday. It's common in warm months before a beginning of winter dip.

pois.copy: Studios or fitness centers where yoga can be practiced and businesses focused on well-being are most common near this activity.

overview.description: Looking good and reaching fitness goals is all about discipline: Eat right. Work hard. No excuses. This segment is more likely to view working out as a means to an end.

topics.copy: Topics center around plans, motivation, and goals for fitness. Weight-loss and improvements to physical appearance are common targets for this group.

age.copy: This type of fitness interest has an association with younger neighborhoods, particularly with high counts of millennial residents.

income.copy: As income rises so does the prevalence of this activity.

education.copy: Neighborhoods with high levels of this activity tend to have denser populations of bachelor degree holders.

employment.copy: These neighborhoods tend to have below average unemployment. Commonly found where residents work in the retail industry or have corporate management careers.

ethnicity.copy: High scoring neighborhoods are diverse across ethnicities, slightly more common in Hispanic and Asian neighborhoods.

urbanicity.copy: This type of fitness interest is more common in urban neighborhoods.

home_ownership.copy: Home ownership rates are lower than the national average in high scoring areas.

political_affiliation.copy: Voters in these fitness oriented neighborhoods supported more liberal candidates in 2016.

other_insights: Buildings in high scoring areas are likely to be newer, and these neighborhoods have fewer than average old buildings.

time.copy: This type of fitness activity is high early in the week, gradually trailing off. Tends to be more common early in the year and dips late summer.

pois.copy: Businesses specializing in fitness, appearance improvement, or cheat meals are common in high scoring neighborhoods.
